verses.text: \w A|strong="H3588"\w* crusher \w has|strong="H3063"\w* come \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* face: \w keep|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H1319"\w* look-out, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w watched|strong="H2009"\w*, \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w yourself|strong="H7272"\w* strong, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* power \w be|strong="H5750"\w* greatly \w increased|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H2388"\w* good \w the|strong="H6440"\w* vine \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Jacob, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w well|strong="H3966"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* vine \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Israel: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wasters \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* waste \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* destruction \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* branches \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* vine.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* body-covers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* fighting \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* red, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* war \w are|strong="H3478"\w* clothed \w in|strong="H3068"\w* bright red: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* war-carriages \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* flames \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* gets ready, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* horses \w are|strong="H3478"\w* shaking.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* war-carriages \w are|strong="H3117"\w* rushing through \w the|strong="H3117"\w* streets, pushing \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* wide ways, looking \w like|strong="H0376"\w* \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* lights, running \w like|strong="H0376"\w* thunder-flames.

\w He|strong="H2351"\w* takes \w the|strong="H1984"\w* record \w of|strong="H7393"\w* \w his|strong="H7323"\w* great men: \w they|strong="H7323"\w* go falling \w on|strong="H7323"\w* their way; \w they|strong="H7323"\w* go \w quickly|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* wall, \w the|strong="H1984"\w* cover \w is|strong="H4758"\w* made ready.
\w The|strong="H2142"\w* river doorways \w are|strong="H2346"\w* forced open, \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* king's house is flowing away.

\w And|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* queen \w is|strong="H5104"\w* uncovered, she \w is|strong="H5104"\w* taken \w away|strong="H4127"\w* \w and|strong="H8179"\w* \w her|strong="H8179"\w* servant-girls \w are|strong="H8179"\w* weeping like \w the|strong="H8179"\w* sound \w of|strong="H8179"\w* doves, hammering \w on|strong="H5104"\w* their breasts.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5324"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* pool \w of|strong="H6963"\w* water whose waters \w are|strong="H5927"\w* flowing \w away|strong="H1540"\w*; Keep \w your|strong="H5921"\w* place, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*; \w but|strong="H5921"\w* no \w one|strong="H5324"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* turning \w back|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H5975"\w* silver, \w take|strong="H5975"\w* gold; \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* end \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* store; \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* yourselves \w a|strong="H5975"\w* weight \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w things|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* desired.

\w Everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w taken|strong="H0962"\w* \w from|strong="H2091"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w*, she \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0369"\w* turned \w to|strong="H0369"\w* water, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* knees \w are|strong="H0369"\w* shaking, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* twisted \w in|strong="H3701"\w* pain, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* colour \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* \w from|strong="H2091"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* faces.

Where \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lions' hole, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H3605"\w* where \w the|strong="H3605"\w* young lions got \w their|strong="H3605"\w* food, where \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lion \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* she-lion \w were|strong="H6440"\w* walking \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* young, without cause \w for|strong="H3605"\w* fear?

Food enough \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* she-lions \w was|strong="H0369"\w* pulled \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*; \w his|strong="H0834"\w* hole \w was|strong="H0369"\w* full \w of|strong="H0369"\w* flesh \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* resting-place stored \w with|strong="H1980"\w* meat.

See, \w I|strong="H1767"\w* am against \w you|strong="H1767"\w*, says \w the|strong="H4390"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H4390"\w* armies, \w and|strong="H0738"\w* \w I|strong="H1767"\w* will \w have|strong="H0738"\w* \w your|strong="H4390"\w* war-carriages burned \w in|strong="H2963"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* smoke, \w and|strong="H0738"\w* \w your|strong="H4390"\w* young \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* will be \w food|strong="H2964"\w* \w for|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* sword: \w you|strong="H1767"\w* will no longer get \w your|strong="H4390"\w* \w food|strong="H2964"\w* \w by|strong="H2966"\w* force on \w the|strong="H4390"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H0738"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w your|strong="H4390"\w* she-lions will be stopped \w for|strong="H4390"\w* ever.
